about_the_game:
The free dlc opens up the option to switch off any censorship in the game.
The opponents also lose their underwear now.

To activate it, go to the game menu and check the "full nudity" option.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages,
and may not be appropriate for viewing at work:
Nudity and sexual content, general mature content

All characters involved are fictional and over the age of 18.
